title: Impact of double shifts on price of good X

content.question: Given an increase in the price of material K— which is an input used to produce good X— and an increase in the price of good Y— which is a substitute for good X— which of the following will definitely occur?

choices.label: The equilibrium price of good X will decrease.
The equilibrium price of good X will increase.
The equilibrium quantity of good X will be unaffected.
The equilibrium quantity of good X will increase.
The equilibrium quantity of good X will decrease.

content.answer: The equilibrium price of good X will increase.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
